tasks.label: üèóÔ∏è Create a structure JSON profile
tasks.command: echo "Create a JSON profile design system that extracts structural and positioning data from the provided screenshots. The JSON output is intended to provide context to Cursor (or another AI) for the purpose of replicating the layout and composition of these design systems in a consistent manner. Explicitly avoid including specific visual style values (such as color, exact fonts, shadows, or border radii), focusing instead on the component hierarchy, spatial relationships, layout mechanics (grid/flex), relative sizing, and positioning. The final JSON output must include the component tree structure, position mapping, and layout rules that will help the AI replicate the architecture of the design." | pbcopy && echo '‚úÖ Prompt copied to clipboard!'
tasks.detail: Generate prompt for AI to create a structure JSON profile
